H0.text: Stirling who was a British racing driver, who raced from 1948 to 1962 and won 212 of the 529 races he entered, including 16 Formula One Grands Prix. Mike Hawthorn

H1.text: Stirling who was a British racing driver, who raced from 1948 to 1962 and won 212 of the 529 races he entered, including 16 Formula One Grands Prix. Peter Collins

H2.text: Stirling who was a British racing driver, who raced from 1948 to 1962 and won 212 of the 529 races he entered, including 16 Formula One Grands Prix. Roy Salvadori

H3.text: Stirling who was a British racing driver, who raced from 1948 to 1962 and won 212 of the 529 races he entered, including 16 Formula One Grands Prix. Moss

A4.text: Sir Stirling Craufurd Moss was a British racing driver who competed in Formula One from 1951 to 1961 and in other motorsport disciplines until 1962.

A5.text: Moss won a record 212 official races across several motorsport disciplines, including 16 Formula One Grands Prix.
